entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
